name: VR Weapon Lab
description:
Ever wanted to build your own weapon in seconds? Hand load your magazines? Our weapon lab is a preview of gun mechanics in our upcoming unreleased game. 

SHARE YOUR WEAPONS/TIMES WITH US!

This is in very early beta and will constantly be expanding!

~ HOW TO PLAY ~ https://loki-1.gitbook.io/new-world-development/weapon-lab/help

~ UPDATES ~ https://loki-1.gitbook.io/new-world-development/weapon-lab-roadmap/updates

WE ARE LOOKING FOR SOLID FEEDBACK, PLEASE JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER OR CONTACT US WITH ANY AND ALL WAYS WE CAN IMPROVE!
